subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT


BALDWIN'S RAGE!
Alec Baldwin's raging phone
call to his 11-year old daughter,
caught on tape! Why did
he call her "a rude, thoughtless little
pig" and say "You
don't have the brains or the decency as a
human being."
Should Baldwin lose the right to see his
daughter? How did
the tape get out? The explosive story on TV's
most
provocative entertainment news show. 

PLASTIC SURGERY
SECRETS
What is the real story behind stars and plastic
surgery? Who is
getting their bodies overhauled? And why
are they doing it? The
intimate details from the Hollywood
surgeon who actually does
the procedures in the interview
you will see only on Showbiz
Tonight!

ANNA NICOLE
BABY CUSTODY BATTLE
Larry Birkhead, Howard K. Stern, and
Anna Nicole Smith's
daughter head back into a Bahamian
courtroom. Will Birkhead,
who is the real father, finally
get to take baby Dannielynn
home with him? Or will Anna
Nicole's mother keep on fighting
him? Showbiz Tonight is
all over the latest developments.


ON SHOWBIZ
TONIGHT THIS WEEKEND:
SATURDAY- Stars and depression. Why
are so many celebrities now
speaking so openly about their
battles with depression? How the
stars are coping and what
we can learn from their struggles.  
SUNDAY-What happens
when addictions tear apart Hollywood
marriages. Why do some
marriages fall apart while others manage
to survive ? The
secrets of the stars who manage to make it
work.  

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY: 
Alec Baldwin's
Phone Tirade:Should he be denied visitation
rights with his
daughter?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT. 

SEND
US A VIDEO EMAIL! 
Send your response to the Question Of
The Day on video. Look
into your camera and tell us what
you think. Responses must be
no longer than 30 seconds. To
send your video email, go to
cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch
your video responses on "Showbiz
Tonight" at 
11 p.m.
ET/PT on CNN Headline Prime.
